title: CursedCTF
desc: The problem will tell you if the flag is not in the format cursed{*}. If not specified everything is lowercase. Enjoy!
initialText: If you figure this entire thing out after October 11st you can get your name on the honor roll below.

questions.content: This CTF is protected from XSS, but what does it use?
